Name: Green Missile
Notes: additional 41 frames of lag upon landing. misfire is the strong hitbox, regular hitbox does between 5%-26%, depending on charge

Notes: weak hitbox frames 6-23 and has 2 frames shieldstun. can grab edge as soon as frame 27

Notes: weak hitbox frames 6-23 and has 2 frames shieldstun. can grab edge as soon as frame 27
